rukus.text: Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, maruyamu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Ka no on'na ga kazoku kara hanarete azuma no ba ni hiki komotta toki
ka no on'na wa kare-ra kara (mi o saegiru) maku o tareta. Sonotoki ware wa waga seirei (jiburiru) o tsukawashita. Kare wa 1-ri no rippana ningen no sugata de kano on'na no mae ni arawareta
Kano on'na wa itta. `Anata (jiburiru) ni taishite jihibukaki okata no mikago o inorimasu. Moshi anata ga,-nushi o osorete ora rerunaraba (watashi ni chikayoranaide kudasai)
Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, anata no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shito ni suginai. Seijun'na musuko o anata ni sazukeru (shirase no) tame ni
Ka no on'na wa itta. `Imada katsute, dare mo watashi ni furemasen. Mata watashi wa futeide mo arimasen. Doshite watashi ni musuko ga arimashou

Kare (tenshi) wa itta. `Sodearou. (Daga) anata no omo wa ose rareru. “Sore wa ware ni totte wa yoina kotodearu. Sore de kare (musuko) o hitobito e no shirushi to nashi, mata ware kara no jihi to suru tamedearu. (Kore wa sudeni) arra no o meirei ga atta kotodearu.”
Koshite, ka no on'na wa kare (musuko) o ninshin shitanode, toi tokoro ni hiki komotta
Daga bunben no kutsu no tame ni, natsumeyashi no kan ni omomuki, ka no on'na wa itta. `A , kon'na kotoni naru mae ni, watashi wa naki mono ni nari, bokyaku no naka ni kietakatta
Sonotoki (koe ga atte) ka no on'na o shita no kata kara yonda. `Kanashinde wa naranai. Omo wa anata no ashimoto ni Ogawa o tsukura reta
Mata natsumeyashi no kan o, anata no kata ni yuriugokase. Shinsen'na juku shita natsumeyashi no mi ga ochite koyou

Tabe katsu nonde, anata no me o hiyashi nasai. Soshite moshi dareka o mitanaraba,“watashi wa jihibukaki omo ni, saikai no yakusoku o shimashita. Sorede kyo wa, dare tomo o hanashi itashimasen. ” To itte yaru ga i
Sorekara kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o daite jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaette kita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Maruyamu yo, anata wa, nanto taihen'na koto o shite kureta no ka
Harun no shimai yo, anata no chichi wa warui hitode wa nakatta. Hahaoya mo futei no on'nade wa nakatta nodaga
Sokode kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o yubisashita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Doshite watashi-tachi wa, Yo kago no naka no akanbo ni hanasu koto ga dekiyou ka
(Sonotoki) kare (musuko) wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni arra no shimo bedesu. Kare wa keiten o watashi ni atae, mata watashi o yogen-sha ni nasa remashita
Mata kare wa, watashi ga doko ni iyoutomo shukufuku o ataemasu. Mata seimei no aru kagiri reihai o sasage, kisha o suru yo, watashi ni o meiji ni narimashita
Mata watashi no haha ni koyo o tsukusa se, koman'na megumarenai-sha ni nasa remasendeshita
Mata watashi no shussei no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, watashi no ue ni heian ga arimasu yo ni
Sono ko to (isa ga maruyamu no kodearu koto) ni tsuite, kare-ra (Yudaya kyoto, kirisutokyoto) wa utagatte iruga hontoni shinjitsu sonomonodearu
Arra ni kodomo ga dekiru nado to iu koto wa arienai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare ga ichiji o kettei sa re, tada `are.' To ose ni nareba, sunawachi aru nodearu
Hontoni arra wa, watashi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsukae nasai. Kore koso tadashi michidearu
Sorenanoni kare-ra no ma de, sho shuha ga kotonaru. Shinjinai mono koso wazawaidearu. Idainaru Ni~Tsu no shinpan no tame ko
Kare-ra ga wa ga mae ni makari deru hi, nanto hakkiri to kikoe mata mierudearou ka. Daga fugimono-tachi wa, kyo (gense de) wa akiraka ni 迷誤 No naka ni iru
Anata wa kaikon no hi (fukkatsu no hi) ni tsuite, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai. Sonotoki, koto wa kettei sa reru nodearu. Kare-ra ga yudan shi, mata fushinjindearu ma ni
Ware wa, daichi to sono-jo ni aru subete no mono o sozoku suru. Mata ware ni, kare-ra wa kaeru nodearu
